div.div: Beloit College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: LFC won toss and elected to receive. Beloit will defend East end zone.
Kam Sallee kickoff 64 yards to the LFC01, Alex Pasiewicz return 7 yards to the LFC08 (George Jacobsen).
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
Joey Valdivia rush for 39 yards to the LFC47, out-of-bounds (Xavier Haynes).
Charlie Quinn rush for 6 yards to the BC47 (Danny Quijas).
